snippet: A former Harvard student was sentenced Friday to three years in prison after pleading guilty in connection with the 2009 fatal shooting of a Cambridge man during a drug robbery inside a dormitory.
lead_paragraph: A former Harvard student was sentenced Friday to three years in prison after pleading guilty in connection with the 2009 fatal shooting of a Cambridge man during a drug robbery inside a dormitory.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Woman Sentenced for Actions After Dorm Killing
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Woman Sentenced For Actions After Dorm Killing
